# defaultRenderQuality

**Instance Property**

The default render quality used on this platform.

## Declaration

```swift
var defaultRenderQuality: LayerRenderer.RenderQuality { get }
```

## Discussion

This should be used as the base render quality value for the platform.

Use it to decide your maximum render quality, see `LayerRenderer.Configuration.maxRenderQuality`.

## Defining quality level

- **renderQuality**: Get the render quality to be used by the drawables.
- **maxRenderQuality**: The max render quality the layer can use when drawing to the drawables.
- **Defining layer renderer quality**: Declare the render quality of your textures to enable high-quality rendering.
